title: ISic003083. I.Sicily inscription 003083
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΠΡΕΙΓΟΜ
2ΕΝΙΑivy-leafΕΤ
3[.]Νivy-leafΠΕ´ivy-leaf

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Brugnone, checked against photograph.

translation

commentary

Preigomenia for Preimogenia, with similar metathesis in IG 14.546 (Katana), Syracusae and elsewhere.

bibliography

  • 36.0832 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Brugnone 1984-1985 249-250, pl.19 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002121
